branding.title: Nano Banana is powered by world-class platforms

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Nano Banana
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: Nano Banana (Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash Image) is a next-generation AI image editor that lets you edit and enhance photos with natural language prompts, delivering precise transformations, consistent characters and objects, and seamless visual quality for creative professionals and everyday users alike.

image.alt: Designer using Nano Banana to create marketing visuals

items.title: Realistic Style Transformations
items.description: From photorealism to stylized art, Nano Banana adapts seamlessly to your preferred visual direction. The AI model can handle complex artistic styles while maintaining authenticity and clarity.

items.title: Reliable Multi-Character Adjustments
items.description: Editing multiple characters in a single frame has always been a challenge in AI image editing. Nano Banana solves this by keeping proportions, interactions, and expressions consistent across edits.

items.title: Lightning-fast generation
items.description: Blitz through concept exploration because nano banana delivers multiple high-resolution drafts before your inspiration cools, making comparison effortless.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why teams choose Nano Banana
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Teams choose nano banana to anchor brainstorming, production, and delivery inside one adaptive environment.

items.title: Launch campaigns faster
items.description: Accelerate campaign launches as nano banana interprets briefs, surfaces template prompts, and auto-sizes assets for every channel.

image.alt: Marketing team launching campaign assets with Nano Banana

items.title: Protect your brand assets
items.description: Defend brand equity when the platform rebuilds textures, packaging gleam, and typography fidelity across every render.

image.alt: Product photography enhanced by Nano Banana

items.title: Collaborate confidently
items.description: Unlock transparent collaboration because the studio tracks versions, highlights decisions, and streamlines sign-off loops.

image.alt: Team collaborating on Nano Banana workflow

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How Nano Banana works
usage.description: Turning imagination into launch-ready imagery takes three grounded stages inside nano banana.

items.title: Describe or upload your vision
items.description: Describe or upload your vision and nano banana reads tone, subject, and context before proposing starting compositions.

items.title: Fine-tune style and details
items.description: Fine-tune style and details with sliders that link to lighting, lens, and narrative presets for consistent output.

items.title: Download and share instantly
items.description: Download and share instantly while the system packages layered files, transparent PNGs, and brand-safe archives.
